sentences.en: a high level of proficiency in English

sentences.en: As a rule, the pharmacy's proficiency and authority is little doubted.
sentences.cn: 通常, 药房的职业水平和权威是很少受到怀疑的.

sentences.en: Beijing has translated into 300 professional proficiency, experienced translators, proof - reading talents.
sentences.cn: 京成翻译拥有300位专业精通 、 经验丰富的翻译 、 校对人才.

sentences.en: Do you think the TOEFL score is a good yardstick for English proficiency?
sentences.cn: 你认为托福成绩是一种衡量英语流利程度的好标准 吗 ?

sentences.en: Evidence of basic proficiency in English is part of the admission requirement.
sentences.cn: 英语基本熟练是入学条件之一。

sentences.en: Extreme contempt for their English proficiency, so I decided to hard up!
sentences.cn: 英语水平极度鄙视自己, 所以决定奋发向上!

sentences.en: He made little proficiency in literary accomplishments.
sentences.cn: 他在文学方面成就不多.

sentences.en: His proficiency as a surgeon is well known.
sentences.cn: 他作为一名外科医生的水平是有名的.

sentences.en: How do you think of your proficiency in written and spoken English?
sentences.cn: 你认为你的书面英语和口语熟练程度 如何 ?

sentences.en: How do you think your proficiency in written and spoken English?
sentences.cn: 你认为你的书面英语和口语熟练程度如何?。

sentences.en: I brought her proficiency up to the required level.
sentences.cn: 我把她的熟练程度提高到所规定的水平。

sentences.en: Maintain proficiency in all designated third party products and services.
sentences.cn: 熟练维护所有指定的第三方产品和服务.

sentences.en: Mr. Darcy spoke with affectionate praise of his sister's proficiency.
sentences.cn: 达西先生极其恳切地把他妹妹的成就赞扬了一番.

sentences.en: Nick’s proficiency with computers is well known.
sentences.cn: 尼克对电脑很在行是出了名的。

sentences.en: Proficiency in English and Chinese languages, both spoken and written.
sentences.cn: 熟练掌握英语, 听说读写.

sentences.en: Proficiency in instrument and computer technologies , good communication skills, and a M.
sentences.cn: 要求能熟练操作机器和电脑, 良好的交流沟通能力.

sentences.en: Quality English reading is an important element for improving students'English proficiency.
sentences.cn: 优质英语阅读是提升学生英语能力重要的一环.

sentences.en: Senior conclusive proficiency in graphic of teacher training university.
sentences.cn: 在师范大学就读期间熟练掌握高级绘画技巧.

sentences.en: The English competency is very important here. How is your English proficiency?
sentences.cn: 在我们这里,英语能力是至关重要的. 你的英语水平 如何 ?

sentences.en: With study and practice, almost anyone can do it with some level of proficiency, but most people don't learn how to think critically or analytically—nor are they even aware of its value.
sentences.cn: 通过学习和实践，几乎任何人都能以不同的熟练程度来掌握它，但是大多数人都不会去学习如何进行批判性或分析性思维，或者说，他们根本意识不到其价值。

phrases.tran_cn: 能力验证；技术检查；熟练测试

trans.tran_en: a good standard of ability and skill
